name: @buddies/frontend
description: Buddies Frontend - Next.js application for pet adoption matching
author: elchika-inc

scripts.build:prod: rm -rf .next dist && CF_PAGES=1 NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build:dog: rm -rf .next dist && source .env.dog && NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build:cat: rm -rf .next dist && source .env.cat && NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build:dog:ci: rm -rf .next dist && NEXT_PUBLIC_PET_TYPE=dog NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=https://buddies-dogs.elchika.app NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://buddies-api.elchika.app NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY=b80f83e113c5463a811607a30afd133dbb0b3c39a0eb41ebac716e29eeda27fb NEXT_PUBLIC_ENVIRONMENT=production CF_PAGES=1 next build
scripts.build:cat:ci: rm -rf .next dist && NEXT_PUBLIC_PET_TYPE=cat NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=https://buddies-cats.elchika.app NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://buddies-api.elchika.app NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY=b80f83e113c5463a811607a30afd133dbb0b3c39a0eb41ebac716e29eeda27fb NEXT_PUBLIC_ENVIRONMENT=production CF_PAGES=1 next build
scripts.deploy: npm run pages:build && npx wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name=buddies
scripts.deploy:dog: npm run build:dog:ci && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=buddies-dogs --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:cat: npm run build:cat:ci && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=buddies-cats --commit-dirty=true
